channel.title: Brachypodium Distachyon on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Brachypodium Distachyon on funPlantGenes

item.title: BdCAD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g06480 Gene Symbol: BdCAD1 Gene Name: cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Disrupting the cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 1 gene (BdCAD1) leads to altered lignification and improved saccharification in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BdERECTA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g46450 Gene Symbol: BdERECTA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdERECTA controls vasculature patterning and phloem-xylem organization in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BdES43
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g55090 Gene Symbol: BdES43 Gene Name: Genome: BdGDB (http://plantgdb.

item.title: BdFAR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BdFAR4 Gene Name: fatty acyl-coenzyme A reductase Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdFAR4, a root-specific fatty acyl-coenzyme A reductase, is involved in fatty alcohol synthesis of root suberin polyester in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BdFAR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BdFAR4 Gene Name: Genome: Brachypodium_distachyon_v3.

item.title: BdFTL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g07070 Gene Symbol: BdFTL1 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T1 Genome: BdGDB Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Description: Transgenic assays showed that both BdFTL1 and BdFTL2 could promote flowering, whereas BdFTL2 was essential for flowering initiation.

item.title: BdFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g48830 Gene Symbol: BdFTL2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T2 Genome: B.

item.title: BdPMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g36910 Gene Symbol: BdPMT Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Stacking AsFMT overexpression with BdPMT loss of function enhances monolignol ferulate production in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BdWRKY38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g30695 Gene Symbol: BdWRKY38 Gene Name: Genome: Bd21 reference genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdWRKY38 is required for the incompatible interaction of Brachypodium distachyon with the necrotrophic fungus Rhizoctonia solani.

item.title: BdWRKY44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g44270 Gene Symbol: BdWRKY44 Gene Name: Genome: Bd21 reference genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Demonstrated that Bd3-1, an accession of the model grass Brachypodium distachyon, is resistant to R.

item.title: Bradi5g03300
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi5g03300 Gene Symbol: Bradi5g03300 Gene Name: UDP-Glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Using the model cereal species Brachypodium distachyon, we show that the Bradi5g03300 UGT converts DON into D3G in planta.

item.title: BUZZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g46007 Gene Symbol: BUZZ Gene Name: Genome: reference Bd21 genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BUZZ: an essential gene for postinitiation root hair growth and a mediator of root architecture in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: FPL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g12450 Gene Symbol: FPL1 Gene Name: FLOWERING PROMOTING FACTOR 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: FPL1 and FPL7 repress flowering under long-day conditions in B.

item.title: FPL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g18240 Gene Symbol: FPL7 Gene Name: FLOWERING PROMOTING FACTOR 7 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: FPL1 and FPL7 repress flowering under long-day conditions in B.

item.title: Iw1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi5g01180 Gene Symbol: Iw1 Gene Name: Inhibitor of wax 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: Using synteny and a large number of F2 gametes, Iw1 was fine-mapped to a sub-cM genetic interval on wheat chromosome arm 2BS, which includes a single collinear gene from the corresponding Brachypodium and rice physical maps.

item.title: NRT1.1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g16670 Gene Symbol: NRT1.1A Gene Name: Genome: reference Bd21 genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: NRT1.

item.title: SWAM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi2g47590 Gene Symbol: SWAM1 Gene Name: SECONDARY WALL ASSOCIATED MYB1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: SWAM1 overexpression (SWAM-OE) lines had greater above-ground biomass with only a slight change in flowering time while SWAM1 dominant repressor (SWAM1-DR) plants were severely dwarfed with a striking reduction in lignin of sclerenchyma fibers and stem epidermal cell length.

item.title: VRN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g08340 Gene Symbol: VRN1 Gene Name: VERNALIZATION 1 Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: VERNALIZATION1 (VRN1), in leaves, thereby preventing overaccumulation of FLOWERING LOCUS T1 (FT1) at the juvenile stage.
